oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Innovation for Fashion or Action? Building Innovation Capacity
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: S. Nederlof
M. Remco
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This book reports on a number of experiences at implementing innovation platforms in African countries. Elaborates on a number of learning lessons to feed back into design and implenttion processes.
